titles.title: To require the Government Accountability Office to produce a report on esophageal cancer, and for other purposes.
To require the Government Accountability Office to produce a report on esophageal cancer, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 42 - 0.
